name: synergistically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that causes or involves synergy (= the combined power of working together that is greater than the power achieved by working separately): High-fat and high-sugar diets promote inflammation in a manner that acts synergistically with stress. She advises young people that smoking and sunbathing work synergistically - each magnifies the harm that the other causes.
More examplesFewer examplesThe compounds in foods may act synergistically to provide health benefits.There is little evidence that these individual lifestyle factors interact synergistically with physical factors.These strategies used together can act synergistically to slow diseases related to ageing.
